sources.title: Don't Take It to Heart!
sources.description: Title: Don't Take It to Heart! Summary: The castle ghost helps the lady and the lawyer beat off developers. Directed by: Jeffrey Dell Actors: Richard Bird, Edward Rigby, Esma Cannon Production Company: Two Cities Films Release Date: 13 November 1944 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A stray World War Two bomb releases the ghost of the 3rd Earl of Chaunduyt after 400 years. A visiting professor, while wooing the beautiful Lady Mary, daughter of the present Earl, finds him an ally in his fight on behalf of the villagers to protect their ancient rights against a meddling newcomer.
